name: clientnode
description: upgrade to object orientated rock solid plugins

documentationWebsite.name: clientNode
documentationWebsite.tagline: upgrade to object orientated rock solid plugins<!--deDE:Schreibe Objekt orientierte solide Plugins-->

scripts.build:alternatively: babel --plugins transform-flow-strip-types,transform-runtime --presets env,stage-0 --source-maps inline --out-file index.compiled.js index.js && npm run build:test
scripts.build:test: babel --plugins transform-flow-strip-types,transform-runtime --presets env,stage-0 --source-maps inline --out-file test.compiled.js test.js && sed --in-place --regexp-extended "s/('use strict';)/\1if(typeof module!=='undefined'\&\&eval('typeof require')!=='undefined'\&\&module!==eval('require.main')\&\&'paths'in module\&\&typeof __dirname!=='undefined')module.paths=eval('require.main.paths').concat(module.paths.filter((path)=>eval('require.main.paths').includes(path)));/" test.compiled.js
scripts.prepare: if ! npm run build; then echo You should rerun install procedure to resolve dependency cycle. && npm run buildAlternatively; fi

transform.#: To provide a generic logging mechanism we need this feature to be exported.

module.#: For Task "test", this module would produce this error "ERROR in ./test.js Module build failed (from ./node_modules/babel-loader/lib/index.js): TypeError: clientNode/test.js: Cannot read property 'end' of null".
module.#0: For external task "clear", this module would produce this error "UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot create property 'next' on string '.dynamicConfiguration-0.json' at Function.<anonymous> (clientNode/index.compiled.js:1:80221)".
module.#1: To provide a generic logging mechanism we need this feature to be exported.
